website_summaries.verdict: It's a smart option if you have limited space or prefer a glider with contemporary style.
pros: Boasts a lightweight, compact design upholstered in stain- and water-resistant microsuede
cons: Some testers commented that some mothers might prefer a glider with a higher back rest

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these in my large dining room. They are so comfortable, everyone loves to sit in them. I just ordered two for our wine room. They are very comfortable, sturdy, and they don't take up a lot of space, not to mention they are very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great glider, soft, comfortable, and quiet
customer_reviews.text: This is our second Bablyletto Madison Swivel glider (I wanted one in our toddler's room and the baby nursery). This chair is soft and comfortable and rocks really well with no squeaky sounds. It has a very solid round metal base so I don't worry about it tipping over. I bought a small carpet cleaning machine and used it to clean our first glider and it came out looking almost new. We don't have an ottoman with ours and feel like this glider works fine without one. I am 5'2" and my spouse is 6' and we both find this chair comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lfc 19

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality l. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this chair an honest benefit of the doubt. I desperately wanted a rocker that also swiveled. Upon arrival I was very excited. It came put together and ready to be placed in the nursery. It is small, but I still liked it. I breastfed and rocked my son in this for several months comfortably. But, then it started making a terrible sound. We flipped it over and sure enough one of the brackets had broken. For the price, the quality is very poor. This is the only purchase I've ever made on Amazon that I regret. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chair
customer_reviews.text: I just received it two days ago, therefore this might not be too useful as of yet for those of you who are wondering whether this chair will hold up for long, but it is so comfy and soft that I just had to share it. It rocks back and forth with such an ease that you might fall asleep in it. I am 5'10" and 37 weeks pregnant, and wanted to say that this chair is not too small as some of the reviews state. I will make sure to post a review in couple of months to share about the chair's durability.
customer_reviews.author: sylwia n.

customer_reviews.title: 5 years later, still awesome
customer_reviews.text: Sitting here with my 2nd baby rocking him and thinking of how awesome this chair is. I ordered this in April 2014, now 5 years later it still looks and feels brand new after using it all the time. Love this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality chair at the right price
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have a newer home with limited space in the living room area. We are frequent Amazon customers, and by chance, we came across the Babyletto Madison Swivel Glider. This is a perfect fit for our living room. We used it to replace a large recliner. The chair is exceptionally well-made, is very attractive, and is functional. We need the swivel function to be able to watch our television in the chair, and the glide rocker part and the large seat cushion make the chair very comfortable. The fabric is also of high quality. We highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Terrific price
customer_reviews.text: These are great chairs and made quite well for a very reasonable price. I ordered them for my sunroom because of their small footprint. They are so-o comfortable, move very smoothly and the material is fabulous. I got the grey color and they appear to match what was shown online.
customer_reviews.author: Charmvb1

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing chair! I hmmmed and hawed over this purchase for about 3 months before deciding to try it (something about purchasing furniture sight unseen or sat in), and within 1 month bought another. It's an excellent breastfeeding chair, but also just for everyday use, too! We absolutely love the combo glide / swivel, and despite not having a head rest, you can scootch down in it, put your feet up, and rest your head on the back fairly comfortably. (Maybe put a pillow underneath you.)
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Comfy seating for short people!
customer_reviews.text: I felt like I was really taking a chance buying two of these for my kitchen seating area because we are a family of rather short people and I do not want dangling feet! Well, these are great! So comfy, and I live the swivel and the glide! Perfect for reading or conversation. Definitely the best seats in the house! Oh, I bought the ivory color and it's lovely. My nephew spilled something on it within weeks of purchase and I panicked a bit, but it came right off with a Norwex cleaning cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my studio thinking I probably wouldn’t sit in it much. LET ME TELL YOU!!!! I sit in this alllll the time! I love that it rocks, swivels and is quiet. I nap in this (I do have an ottoman), chill here, read, watch TV you name it I’m doing that sitting on this chair. I love the color too. I should mention I am short 5’2.5” so it’s perfect for me. It does lack neck support which is obvious but I can slouch enough and put my feet up that I get the neck support. Love this chair, very happy with my purchase. Also, came assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfortable, and very attractive -- with or without babies to rock.
customer_reviews.text: Our adult kids have had these chairs (in grey) in their family room for years. They are comfortable for adults of many sizes/weights -- and wear like iron!! Super-comfortable to rock the grand-babies to sleep and hold them as they sleep. We (grandparents) just bought two (ecru) for our home. Seating in our breakfast area was needed to create a comfy morning coffee and newspaper reading nook. Babyletto has a winner in these chairs -- even in an all-adult setting.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis BigCat

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! I am using it in my daughter's nursery and it looks great! Her room is small, so I love that it doesn't take up much room. It is really comfortable! I've spent many hours in this chair. The chair wipes easily, my baby has spit up on it & I was so surprised how easy it cleans and doesn't stain. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Cosby

customer_reviews.title: Completely Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I'd have somewhere comfy to nurse my new baby. It's a great fit for the limited space I have, glides and swivels smoothly, and is even more comfortable than I anticipated. I have had problems with my tailbone since before I gave birth to my son and this chair is something I can sit on without pain! The only thing that isn't perfect about this chair is the back. The top half of the back slope backwards and isn't ideal, but was easily fixed by putting a pillow on the part of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimi Fossett-Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Small But Comfy
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is soft to the touch (yet spot cleans easily), and the chair is very comfortable. It also appears to be well built. It both rocks & swivels, so those of us who don't like to sit still are happy. And it's on the small side, so doesn't take up too much space in a smaller room. While I'm sure it would be lovely for new moms & babies, (the high sides offer arm support for nursing), it's also great for extra seating in a family room. After I got the first one, I ordered a second.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Not just for nurseries
customer_reviews.text: This is my second chair I’ve purchased for my family room. Super comfortable and swivel is great but the glider is what is so attractive! It’s a small footprint and looks very nice , not cheap. Micro suede is durable and you can just wipe it off when needed no worries on spills. My chair was so popular this Thanksgiving that two of my in laws ordered them immediately for their homes. Lol! The men love it just as much as women and children. Do not think of this just a nursery chair. Babyletto should create these in fashion colors and market them as regular chairs. They would sell a lot of them as it’s such a great product !
customer_reviews.author: burghchick

customer_reviews.title: Glidetastic.
customer_reviews.text: We've put this glider in the nursery to rock the baby. It glides very smoothly and swivels continuously. After a few months of use the glider base fractured. Apparently this is a known defect and babyletto replaced it for free. The replacement was reinforced at the fracture location and it's been going strong for over a year now with no problems! The chair is comfortable, but don't expect to fall asleep with your baby as there isn't anywhere for you to rest your head.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable for back support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in a nursery, unfortunately I ended up returning it. It was just extremely uncomfortable to sit in. The back was just too far back or at a weird angle, it did not give support. Definitely not what you're looking for to add into a nursery where you're hoping to nurse and rock the baby often. A pillow added did help, I just didn't want to have to rely on a pillow for comfort. If it were comfortable, I would have kept it. The fabric was very nice and it rocked well.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaCarlton

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and fits in tight spaces
customer_reviews.text: This chair was easy to unpack. Moved it right to the spot I had picked out which was a tiny area and it fit perfectly. I can swivel and glide with ease. I had planned on using a foot stool but I no longer see the need. This is my new favorite chair. Very comfortable and cozy. There was one little spot where the fibers seem to face a different direction. Some could be upset by this. I looked at it and decided it wasn’t a big deal. Otherwise it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is on year 5. I ordered it in Ecru (off-white) and it hasn't got a single stain on it! I have rocked all of my children to sleep on it and it fits nicely in the bedroom that it resides in (as we live in a cape and the chair is in the upstairs bedroom).
customer_reviews.author: RLW

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly in our small kid’s room.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new rocking chair when we moved my toddler into a new room before new baby arrives. We already have an expensive rocking recliner for our nursery and just needed something that was smaller and rocked for when we sing our daughter to sleep before naps/bedtime and to read books. This chair works perfectly. The rock is really soothing and although I do sometimes miss leaning my head back, for our purposes it’s not necessary and the chair fits myself and toddler pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Julared

customer_reviews.title: Great accent piece!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!! I got this as an accent chair in my bedroom and it’s perfect for small spaces- however doorways and tight hallways are sometimes an issue when moving. I have not used this in a nursery to feed a baby, however I do work at a daycare in an infant room and can definitely see this as being a great rocking chair! The arms aren’t too high or too low- they sit at the perfect height. I am a plus size person and it still feels roomy. It has held up for over a year now, and still looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Lowkey Lily

customer_reviews.title: Love this as a nursery chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is the best. We have a tiny nursery space that didn’t have room for the big footprint of a rocking chair. Though this says it swivels, it also rocks forward and backward. It’s not the kind of nursing chair you can fall asleep in because of the lack of headrest, which I’ve found is fine. It’s comfortable and supportive. I did need a small ottoman to rest my feet on though (I’m 5’7”). It also wipes clean if there’s a spit up on it and doesn’t show (the navy color).
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: A very nice comfortable chair with nice fabric.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice swivel / glider rocker very comfortable and nice size. It was exactly what I was looking for and is just the right size not to small or not too large. The suede fabric is smooth and well fitted. I would definitely buy again. The shipping carton was a little bit questionable when delivered with some holes and rips but the chair survived the ride. Came fully assembled simply opened the box and placed where we wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: JohnPA

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable and Chic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my newborn daughter in the ecru color. The look is very elegant and simple. The way it's designed and feels as I'm rocking (and I'm not too familiar with gliders) makes me worry that I might fall out of it (either backward or forward) WITH my daughter, so I can't quite give it 5 stars. I just don't know how far I can lean backward or forwards and I'm afraid to find out. As a reference, I'm about 5"5 and 140 pounds. So far, I haven't injured myself in it, so I won't lower my review any further than 4 stars because it is quite comfortable and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: scrupulous_customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like this chair
customer_reviews.text: Really like this chair, didn't buy it for baby or nursing, just needed a smallish chair for our living room. It is comfortable and the swivel and glide are nice and smooth. The seat cushion is a little stiff but still comfortable. The material is a soft velour type material. works just right in our small living room area.
customer_reviews.author: 3 Cat Mama

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs. We originally ordered two for our media/guest room and they were perfect. Guest use them to sit and watch movies and they were just the right size. Ordered two more that just arrived for our new master bedroom remodel and again just what we needed. Comfortable, elegant and compact without feeling confining. My favorite feature is that they rock and swivel. Highly recommend these chairs. Would be great to have additional color options.
customer_reviews.author: Simple Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, until it didn't.
customer_reviews.text: We loved this chair for almost the first year we had it. I realized there would be no head support so I wasn't disappointed in that. However, after about a year of using it, the mechanism underneath just broke. There is nothing we can do about it, the welding fell apart. My husband and I are not abnormally large people so I don't think it's anything we could have done. Now it works only as a chair even though it leans to one side and looks ridiculous. It's disappointing as we've grown very accustomed to rocking our daughter to sleep and now we can't. We spent nearly $300 on a chair that had a three month return and replace window.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleLovesShoes

customer_reviews.title: High quality than pictures
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about ordering this chair. It looks better in person; looks like a much more expensive chair. Friend has an almost identical $1590 chair that doesn’t even rock. This rocks and swivels, and fits really well in a 500 square foot apt. I only wish the cushion came off to vacuum, but otherwise great chair
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: These chairs although small rock and swivel smoothly.
customer_reviews.text: Product exceeded all my expectations. Color was perfect and matched well with my existing furniture. The level of comfort was confirmed by my nephews. One is 6'2 and the other is approximately 5'5. I am 5'. We all agreed regarding how comfortable the chairs are. Yes! I did order another one.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELE CLARK

customer_reviews.title: The Best Piece of Furniture in Baby's Room
customer_reviews.text: If I had to pick only one thing to keep from the baby's room it would be this (and we have great furniture). The chair glides and turns softly and puts baby to sleep and I get to relax and unwind. Bought this in slate color which in picture looks brown, but since I read previous reviews and saw other customers' photos that it is more like gray, I bought it since that was the color I wanted. Looks beautiful and chic, feels great, and best of all is the amazing price! I do not recommend it to heavy weight people though because the performance of the chair diminishes significantly and the chair's resistance is limited (hence the low price).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy furniture online,but these are just as advertised. I'm a big guy, 6'2 , 245lbs. and am very comfortable in them . They came all assembled in a gigantic boxes that the ups guy was not happy with.. Make sure you home when they deliver them as you have to watch they don't destroy them.
customer_reviews.author: PTVEGAS

customer_reviews.title: Wish they had picture of the color slate...more like a light silver
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this chair but ended up very disappointed with it. There was no picture of slate and I assumed it would be more of a darker grey instead of a very light silver with strong green tones....doesn't work at all in my space.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect seats
customer_reviews.text: Great seats, my only complain was that one of them came with a small hole on it. I called costurmer services and they reimburse me some money which I was fine it because I was not about to wait another 2 months to get it. My only complaint is that you have to wait a long time for them but over all they are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Alex y

customer_reviews.title: Holding up great!
customer_reviews.text: We spent quite a bit of time searching for small comfy chairs for the front of our fireplace area, and finally decided to take the plunge and buy these 2 swivel chairs. We couldn't be happier with them. Our cat sleeps on them daily, our dog rubs against them daily, and yet they still look new and are holding up well after more than 4 months. No signs of stain (I never believe this until I see it) and while they are used daily, look great. We would easily buy these again and may in the future for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Tara C. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect little chair
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect little chair! We have a small living room and needed additional seating that wasn't obtrusive. Matched my whit/cream recliner well. Comfy and soft.
customer_reviews.author: m. ber

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This chair feels fantastic. The material is amazingly soft - i was worried about it being so small that it wouldn't be comfortable but i was wrong. Hubby likes it as well. Arrived in record time, packaging in tact and no assembly required. For anyone wondering if this is more taupe or grey it is a true grey, no brown or tan tones at all.
customer_reviews.author: RJK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a nursery
customer_reviews.text: I love this! The fabric is so soft and it feels high quality. It also is the perfect size for the nursery, not too big yet barely fit through the bedroom door. I got the white, I love the look I just hope it is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tesia Webb

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chair
customer_reviews.text: OK I can't say enough about how much I love this chair for about $200. Yes you can find better quality chairs out there, but you're going to pay a lot more money for them. This thing is comfortable, the mechanics operate nice and smooth, and the quality is good, hell for the price it's fantastic. I'm so happy with this one I want to get a second one for the other side of the room.
customer_reviews.author: stonehenge00

customer_reviews.title: Solid little chair
customer_reviews.text: Good little chair it's rocks and spins smoothly. Currently using it in living room and it's soft and has a small footprint, pretty comfortable chair. I liked the first one so much that I got a 2nd one.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Great little chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very comfy, has a great glide and swivel action. I've been surprised how nice it looks too, we actually put it in the living room along our nice furniture. Arrives fully assembled in a box, which is impressive. Great for rocking the baby, or just as a nice chair to sit in
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hurley

customer_reviews.title: So Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I am 5.5 feet tall. All chairs usually have a seat depth that is too big and hits me on my knees, giving no back support. This chair is so comfy. It is a perfect chair for a woman. I only wish it was available in my colors, like burgundy or forest green. The price for a comfy chair is very reasonable. It fits very well in my tiny living room.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Prine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I instantly fell in love with the look of this chair while planning my daughter's nursery but was hesitant about the comfort. Well I went ahead and ordered it because I didn't really have room for anything bigger and I'm so glad I did! It looks awesome and is so comfortable for both me (5'2") and my husband (5'10"). It doesn't have a headrest and I couldn't really fall asleep in it but that's fine because I mainly use it for nursing and to read to baby anyway. Plus, it was a steal on Amazon, came fully assembled and the shipping was free!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vgonz039

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of nursery furniture..
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, gliding action is nice for rocking a baby or yourself to sleep. It looks great in my sister's nursery and it's much more affordable than other chairs I've seen. It would be nice to have a head rest or the arms of the chair more defined, Otherwise, this is a great chair. This chair can actually outgrow a nursery room and may fit with other furniture around the house (i.e. living room, bedroom, den, or reading nook), which adds to its overall appeal.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Solid swiveling and gliding chair for smaller spaces.  Good value for the money. Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid chair for the price. It not only swivels but also glides back and forth. It is comfortable and compact. The color I received was as shown in a light gray color. Very nice quality chair for smaller spaces. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Muto

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, good quality chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is beautiful. Is exactly what I’m looking for my baby girl nursery’s room. I was looking for something not too bulky, since I have limited space, but at the same time comfortable and looks pretty. It was delivered on time plus it was nicely protected. Might have to buy another one or two for my room and my son. A good chair to have for reading and/or just for relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Redw0lfx

customer_reviews.title: attention short people!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'1" and have trouble finding comfortable easy chairs. This is my second purchase of this style chair (the first lasted almost 10 years, and took me forever to find it again). My mother (also short) prefers this chair and will camp in it during every visit. The swivel and rocking motions are very smooth. The only disappointment was in the material, which is less plush than the first one I owned....perhaps because this was meant for a nursery?
customer_reviews.author: Smulligan

customer_reviews.title: We love this chair
customer_reviews.text: We love this chair! I am 19 weeks pregnant, so we haven't used it yet with a baby, but we actually purchased it simply to have in our living room. All of our guests come over and love sitting in it, it's very comfortable and the gliding is a fun, comfortable motion. I also love how neutral the slate color is. The back of it is not super tall, so if you are over 6'', it might not be the most ideal for sitting in ALL the time, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair, style and fabric are perfect as well as swivel/rocker feature. Had purchased this in grey but was too dark as our walls are gray. Returned without a hassle and ordered the same in ecru. With sage green couches the ecru works much better. Looks more vanilla ice cream than ecru, love it! This would've looked good with a different color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: s . g. b.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a small area to have an extra seat for someone to use in my little sleeping area .. I love this chair!! Perfect size and feels so good to sit in and rock (glide). Might repeat this purchase later after remodel is done!!! Works well and smooth gliding!!! Also easy to wipe clean .. fabric is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Beth E. Torrez

customer_reviews.title: Small beautiful comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: I have this beautiful small chair in my bedroom. I love everything about it. The navy color is brilliant and smooth. The fabric is elegant, yet very strong. The cushion is a bit firm, but the curved barrel hugs you very comfortably. The swivel and rocking make it a perfect place to relax.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Bass

customer_reviews.title: The size of the glider.
customer_reviews.text: I needed two smaller chairs to put in my living room by my leather sofa. These are perfect. The sofa doesn't over power them. The sofa is teal and the euru looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Saltglass

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and compact for a small space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this glider because when I read the reviews customers said that it was comfortable and great for a small space. I completely agree with them, not to mention I believe it's a piece of of furniture that can be useful beyond the nursery. I didn't like the way regular rocking chairs would take triple the space and then become an eyesore. This is cute, comfy and I have already gotten many compliments from family and friends. I hope my baby likes it as well when she gets here. My 3 year old can has no problem using it either, so that's great.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased !
customer_reviews.text: Just received our glider! Very pleased with the shipment packaging and timeline. Amazon tracking said it would deliver the 27th and we received way earlier then expected so I’m super pleased with that. The chair is beautiful! And is super comfortable. The only warning I’d give is that it’s more on the creamier color scale then actual white as pictured online. Still a beautiful chair! Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves sitting in this chair!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair for my private salon studio. I use it for my guests getting hair extensions to sit in while I sit on a stool behind them. Perfect height for my needs. My clients rave about how comfortable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: After base replacement, good chair.
customer_reviews.text: The chair arrived damaged, all the ball bearings (save one) loosed out of the base. Evidence on package suggests severe impact damage. Babyletto customer support shipped a replacement base that arrived 5 days later. The new base was clearly an upgrade, with an added bearing gasket to hold the bearings in between the plates. It was a slightly different size base, requiring pre-drilling for reusing the old 6 large screws. Now fixed, chair works well. A little frustrated there was so much work required for the price, but chair is comfortable. Last note- cushion can't be removed for cleaning, it is seen into place; so cleaning crevices are a little more complicated. Still, a comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Belfuri

customer_reviews.title: Cute chair, but not the most functional with infant
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small/less bulky chair for my sons bedroom since his room is smaller. This chair rocks and swivels and looks really nice. The only downside (which I knew when I purchased it) is that I am 5'10' and my husband is tall and the back of the chair isn't very high so its not the best chair to fall asleep in or nurse in when my son was an infant. Now that my son is 1, I am using it to read stories before bed and it works out great.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren E

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy for Baby Room
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! It is compact but still provides support. I love that is swivels and glides/rocks. Perfect for me! Great for feeding the baby. I do have to use support from a pillow under my arm when feeding bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Best versatile nursery glider!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 2" and this is the perfect size for me! I love that it is really soft to the touch and excellent for my small bedroom/nursery. My baby loves to get rocked in this and not to mention playing on it. It is so versatile that I will use it in my livingroom once it's no longer needed as a baby rocker. My husband is 5' 11" but that doesnt stop him from using it to put our babies to sleep or play his ps4 lol
customer_reviews.author: Karina Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this chair and all the movement. Love the fabric. I’m short and the chair is high and stiff for me but works better for taller people.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Glider!
customer_reviews.text: I finally ordered this based on all the great reviews and the belief that it would be easy to return if I didn't love it. Thankfully, we LOVE it!! It's super comfortable and WAY better looking than the average glider. My husband and I regularly argue over who gets to sit in it. Although it seems much smaller than normal, we're both able to sit comfortably (I'm 5'7, he's 6'2). There's space for a pillow or something as well, if you were to need additional back support. I would totally recommend this glider to anyone- especially since it comes delivered right to your doorstep!
customer_reviews.author: Erika B.

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic chair for a small nursery
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit apprehensive about purchasing furniture online, but the color and size seemed right. I am glad I did! This is the perfect chair for a small space. Pros: - Extremely comfortable. - Great for small spaces. - Perfect amount of rock and glide. - Soft material. - High quality. - No breastmilk stains! - Great for short and tall people. Cons: - You can't use a Boppy while in the chair, unless you cram it in.
customer_reviews.author: C. G. Behringer

customer_reviews.title: Worst Product I've ever made the wrong decision of buying
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE, DO NOT BUY IT. THIS IS VERY LOW QUALITY AND THEY WILL GIVE YOU A HARD TIME TO PROVIDE A RETURN LABEL AND REFUND! SCAM!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is AWESOME! Like many others, we were looking for a chair for the baby nursery and needed something small due to limited space. Just couldn't swallow paying some of the high prices we saw, and when I came across this with the great reviews we thought we'd give it a shot. DEFINITELY a great purchase!! You won't go wrong. It's comfortable, doesn't make noise. A great chair for the price point. As some others mentioned also, not having a head rest might be one downfall but I'm 5"2' and I slouch down slightly in it and it works fine for me or really I don't seem to want to use it that often.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rae Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but still love it
customer_reviews.text: This has to be my favorite chair. I’ve used in a nursery, bedroom and living room. It swivels and rocks, seat has some bounce, super soft. My kids even took a marker to it and I was able to get it out. However, it’s soooo heavy!! And since it moves, it’s challenging to carry when moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: I  love this!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around a lot for a chair for my nursery that was both stylish and functional. I am so happy that I ordered this. It is comfortable to nurse and rock the baby in. I never have a back ache like I do when I nurse in a regular rocking chair. Although the back of the chair isn't very tall, it has great lumbar support. It looks great in the room, and any spills or drips or even dog slobber, has wiped clean. My daughter is 6 months old, and the chair still looks brand new. I recommend it to all of my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Katie C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice smooth chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. I really agonized over buying it. Loved some $450 gliders but didn't want to spend that much right now. Was worried this one was junk for price. I'm 5-2 fits perfect. Glides smooth. My 8 year old is already bugging me about when he can read in it. My 6-2 hubby seemed pretty cozy too. For an upstairs library/guest room chair. It's great, just needs a nice throw pillow to jazz it up a bit. The brown is more of a coconut brown rather than the rich deep brown I was expecting. Still looks good enough.
customer_reviews.author: OneLoveFitGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair and Not Just For Rocking Babies Although that's Fun, Too.
customer_reviews.text: We were hesitant to buy chairs listed as nursery furniture since we are lively but decades past the baby stage; but we took the chance since they appeared to be exactly what we wanted to flank our living room fireplace. They are ideal for the job: attractive, well-made, comfy, and even great if a baby ever comes to visit. I noticed the price on our chair went up $30 in the last four days, so I'm glad we bought them when we did.
customer_reviews.author: Mary DeJong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so cute and comfy. It works absolutely perfect in our nursery. It does swivel and glide very smoothly too!
customer_reviews.author: Christana

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair!
customer_reviews.text: A bit bigger than I thought it would be, but then again I never pay attention to measurements :). The fabric is very soft, microfiber I think. Glides very nicely. Plenty of seat room, I expected it to be smaller. Very nice chair. It looks like a regular living room chair, which is a huge plus as that's where it's staying! I think traditional gliders are super ugly and not useable as a living room chair. Can't wait to use it with my baby!!
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great chair but wish the back was higher
customer_reviews.text: It’s soft and easy to clean. Great mechanics with the glide and swivel. I wish the back was higher so that is supported my neck and head.
customer_reviews.author: flipside

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this chair today. I really like it in person. Love the color! The only thing I was wanting is a tad bit higher back, but just didn't have the room for a higher backed chair in our small nursery. I'm very pleased with how comfortable if is even without the high back. It glides and turns very smoothly and you don't need a ton of clearance behind like you need with some "rockers" I am crossing my fingers it is easy to keep clean once the baby gets here!
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: So glad I ordered these chairs!
customer_reviews.text: My chairs came yesterday, and I could not be happier! The chairs were already put together all you had to do was take them out the box and place them where you want. They are the perfect size for my bedroom😁
customer_reviews.author: ANR1011

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CHAIR - GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: This chair is perfect. I have a smaller living space and it fits there just as I had hoped. It is the best value for the price that I have had in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Thomspon

customer_reviews.title: Great chair. Great price!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Very comfortable and great quality. Still waiting for the extreme usage it's going to endure when our child comes, but it has been great so far. My wife really enjoys sitting and rocking in it. My very small gripe would be that I being somewhat tall, that the glider doesn't have any upper back or neck support for me. But it's going to be great for her and the baby. And hopefully makes its way somewhere else in our house after our child gets older.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ROCK AWAY
customer_reviews.text: DOWNSIZING IS NOT EASY AND THESE CHAIRS ARE PERFECT FOR MY NEW LIVINGROOM. I LOVE THE COLOR OF GRAY AND THE VELVET FABRICK. THEY TURN ANY WAY TO HAVE A CONVERSATION OR WATCH T.V. EVERYONE IS FIGHTING TO GET ONE OF THEM WHEN WE ALL SIT DOWN.
customer_reviews.author: CORINE J FRYE, COURT

customer_reviews.title: comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: nice and comfortable, soothing gentle rocking when i need it.
customer_reviews.author: jimmyZ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful suede chairs.
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are beautiful and very comfortable. Compared to restoration hardware comparable chairs they are a fraction of the cost. Luv them!
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Great nursery glider
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great in our small nursery. It gives good arm support for late night feedings. I do wish it had upper back and neck support some nights, but that would definitely change the aesthetic. The footprint is pretty small, so it tucks in by the baby's crib just perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: and comfortable. This was perfect
customer_reviews.text: We don’t have much space in our baby’s room so we were looking for something that worked space wise, was quiet, and comfortable.This was perfect. We have had our chair for about 6 months now, and it’s still quiet and comfortable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Color online looks nothing like the actual color in slate.
customer_reviews.text: As expected because my Mom has the white one. Great chair for small spaces! Swivels and rocks at the same time! However, the slate in real life looks nothing like the picture online. There is nothing brown about it. It is gray and much lighter than the picture makes it seem. Please make the picture represent the actual color. Luckily we have a gray rug, so it works.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Thompson

customer_reviews.title: color
customer_reviews.text: thought I had ordered brown but got grey. other than that, wifey loves it. thank you
customer_reviews.author: carolyn m.

customer_reviews.title: Best chair ever for the nursery!
customer_reviews.text: After much research, we finally found the perfect nursery chair! Our baby is now 10 months old and this chair has held up really well considering we use it multiple times per day for nursing. The design is contemporary and the fabric is super soft. Love the gray color - goes with everything. We didn't really have room for a large ottoman and just purchased a Kidco nursing stool to use with it and it worked perfectly. Looking forward to using this chair elsewhere in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall moms!
customer_reviews.text: I used this chair in my baby boy’s nursery. Because of its smoothe rocking, it was perfect for middle of the night feeds. I am a 6 ft tall female and have no problem getting up out of this chair while holding my baby. Many other chairs sat too low for me to get out of easily. This one was just right.
customer_reviews.author: R Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Soft and a Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great. It's very soft. The rocking and swivel motion makes it very comfortable to sit in. Most chairs like this are significantly more expensive. With some cute throw pillows, this will be a perfect addition to my home!
customer_reviews.author: C. Eagan

customer_reviews.title: Great for short people.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is great and the chair is so comfortable. The rocking and swivel action is spot on. Arrived in perfect condition. Very well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: The BEST rocking chair Ever
customer_reviews.text: The BEST rocking chair Ever!!! The price is amazing for such a good quality chair. Everywhere I looked these chairs are $300 easy. I was worried it wouldn’t be comfortable, but it is and my husband loves it too. Fits perfectly in my daughters nursery and no assembly required which is great! Overall, we couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the chair for which I have been looking
customer_reviews.text: This compact, comfortable 360 degree turn chair fits perfectly into a cozy corner of our summer living room. We can now turn in a full circle to enjoy conversing with our friends and family or rotate to look out upon our lovely lake during the day or during its spectacular sunsets.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these chairs. Purchased 2 and they are our favorite chairs in the house - daily use by the kids - we all love them. Super comfy - kids love to rock and spin. I love the barrel-style with the soft fabric. Had a few stains on them, but they wiped right off and they're holding up great. Would recommend to a friend and purchase more of them if I had more spaces for them.
customer_reviews.author: BeachMom

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Value!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a C or Tub chair for quite awhile. All of the furniture stores in my area offered the chairs but for a much higher price. When I found out that I would have to order them anyway, I looked to Amazon. Very pleased with my purchase. It fits in well with my living room, and provides much comfort. I love the rocking and swivel features. Bonus was that it arrived fully assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this chair!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this chair. My wife and I have used it for a short 4 months and it is broken. We are not big people but somehow the metal support on the chair cracked. See the attached photos. I will be contacting the company as $299 is far too much to pay for a chair that breaks easily. It just is not worth the price that we paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M. Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Back it too low, not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Decided back was too low and uncomfortable. I will likely spend hours in this chair with a newborn and don’t think my neck can take it. Tried to return and it would cost $149...
customer_reviews.author: Everett

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and well made
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these chairs. I ordered two of these in Slate for my living room. They are somewhat small, but very comfortable. My husband is 6'4" and said that while he wouldn't want to sit in them all day, they are even comfy for him! They appear to be very well made, as well. The ONLY reason I've not giving them 5 stars is because the color is not quite as expected. They are a bit lighter in reality than they look in the pictures online, and fabric is a bit shinier (they appear more matte in the photos to me) - however, they're still very nice and I look forward to enjoying them for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisS

customer_reviews.title: Must have. Beautiful chair.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small space. So cute and very comfy. So happy with the purchase. Came fully assembled. So soft. Quiet rocking chair/glider. Wish I had my first baby
customer_reviews.author: Ninette

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours trying to determine what chair to buy this was my choice and I was not disappointed. Great chair my baby loves it. Only thing I can say is I would purchase the foot rest cuz I find myself looking for somewhere to put them. Also if you are really tall I do not recomend it that’s just my opinion because I like to lean back so depending on your needs is how you will feel.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Cornejo

customer_reviews.title: Great glider for nursery!
customer_reviews.text: So good! I was nervous about purchasing furniture online without having tried this in person but the quality is great. My husband and I love it. Fits each of us well - we are an XL frame. Glides, rocks and swivels smoothly. And the fabric feels great- much more expensive than some microsuedes I've seen in the past. And great neutral color we can extend to other rooms one day.
customer_reviews.author: Hu Hughes

customer_reviews.title: baby rocker at our house// smile
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use as a baby rocker and I love it...not too big...swivels and rocks...comfortable...soft! perfect for my need
customer_reviews.author: fraiser

customer_reviews.title: Seat sinks in!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two chairs. Initially very happy. Both got the same amount of wear. One has gotten very soft. The other is fine but in one chair it is so soft that you sink in.
customer_reviews.author: ABB

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Just received my chair a few days ago and have tested it out alot, I love it. My tall husband can sit in it comfortably too. the arms are a perfect height so I can feed the baby with ease. I love how it looks like a regular chair and not like a typical nursery chair. It came ready to use no assembly required. it feels sturdy and heavy so Im definitely happy that it will last for a long time. The price is amazing considering the look of the chair and the sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Dude

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Petit
customer_reviews.text: The chair arrived yesterday, much to my surprise, as I wasn't expecting it for another week! From the look of the box I thought there must be some assembly needed because it seemed a bit short. Upon openeing the box it was actually all intact and though short and small, I was happy with it's size since our nursery is small and let's face it I'm short so it works perfectly and is very comfortable. So far, I would highly recommend this chair!
customer_reviews.author: freckle_07

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy, but screws fall out
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. It is incredibly comfortable to sit it. The cushion is great, it never slides or moves around. It also hasn't flatted over the last year at all. It rocks well, but if the screws are at all loose it is noisy and gets noisier and noiser if you don't address the loose screws. One actually fell off and rolled across the floor. ugh! Not too difficult to tighten them though, so still worth it
customer_reviews.author: JC

product_meta.title: Babyletto Madison Swivel Glider in Mocha Microsuede, Greenguard Gold Certified
product_meta.description: Color:MochaThe Madison Swivel Glider is upholstered by hand in ultra-soft and durable microsuede. Featuring a rounded back and spacious seat, its metal swivel mechanism base allows you to turn and glide a full 360°.
feature_bullets: MID-CENTURY STYLING: Relax and lull babe to sleep in the Madison with classic mid-century curves and smooth gliding 360° swivel metal base.

GREENGUARD GOLD CERTIFIED: The Madison has been tested for over 10,000 chemicals and passes the most stringent emission standards. It helps improve indoor air quality, creating a healthier environment for your baby to sleep, play and grow.

SMALL SPACES APPROVED: The perfect addition to that nook in your nursery. The Madison is compact and space-saving without compromising on comfort and motion. Arrives fully assembled, stress-free and ready to go.
DURABLE MICROSUEDE: Feed and nurse babe without a worry. Upholstered by hand in plush microsuede that's durable and easy to clean

SAFE FOR BABE: We go the extra step to ensure your babe's safety. The Madison meets all CA TB117-2013 flammability requirements and is free of chemical flame retardants, Polybrominated Diphenyl Ethers (PBDEs), and Formaldehyde.

specifications.Material Type: Pocket spring , Synthetic foam, 100%polyester fabric and TSCA compliant plywood
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars574 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
